attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: The second I opened this app, a chihuahua barged into my front door and stole my phone!! I had to get my jet pack and try to catch it while it skateboarded away! It took hours, but the chihuahua finally stopped at some egg-shaped building. I looked through the window and it was like a factory! They were trying to change my phone into a watermelon so I had to find a way to stop them. I used my invisibly cloak that Harry Potter gave me and I snuck through the top-secret porta potty. It brought me to the living room where it had a baby chihuahua in a crib. I thought I would just take it when I get my phone back. I saw a cart and chihuahuas were going towards it, so I decided to enter the cart and they would hopefully bring me to the main area. After a while, the chihuahuas pushing the cart found me! I had to tell them the words â€œOoga booga ooga boogaâ€ because thatâ€™s what my grandfather taught me back in 1969. Those chihuahuas then became on my side so they showed me the way to the main boss. When I arrived in her office, she wasnâ€™t even a dog! It was just a huge robot! She had my phone in her hand and she said, â€œYouâ€™ll never get it back!â€ I tried using the words, â€œOoga booga ooga boogaâ€ but nothing happened. Suddenly, I heard a voice saying, â€œFight!â€ I then became a masked woman with two razor-sharp fans. We began to fight and she was taking down my health bar really fast because the fans would not come back to me when I threw them. I remembered I had to press my big toe so they can teleport back to me. We were both on very low health and I found out I can use the chihuahuas on my side as bowling balls! They curled into a ball and rolled themselves across the arena to trip the big robot, and it was successful. The voice came again, saying, â€œFinish her!â€ I decided not to Bc I felt like there was someone in the robot. I went to it and I took off its helmet and the person in that robot was Peppa the Pig! She was only turning the phones into watermelons Bc they ran out worldwide. I told her that there are still a lot at the Walmart from across the street. She gave me back my phone and everyone elseâ€™s phone that the chihuahuas took. Besides the baby chihuahua, they all went to Disneyland to have a good time while Peppa went to the Walmart from across the street. I then became president of the whole world for my heroic actions and when I unlocked my phone again, the app was still on the loading screen! Worst app ever!
